target.name: dublincore

target.name: usage
target.echo:
Fedora beans generation.
all : Generates the web services clients, foxml and dublincore libraries. ws-clients : Generates client libraries for all fedora web services. foxml : Generates the Fedora FOXML libraries for describing digital objects. dublincore : Generates the beans for working with Dublincore. clean : Cleans everything.
